name: Sports Cars & Monster Trucks Jigsaw Puzzles: logic game for toddlers, preschool kids and little boys
name_original: Sports Cars & Monster Trucks Jigsaw Puzzles: logic game for toddlers, preschool kids and little boys
description:
Beautifully illustrated jigsaw puzzles for kids offers long hours of educational play. Don't wait. Download now!


Key app features:

- 24 fantastic puzzles to choose from
- 2 different game modes – 20 and 48 pieces
- Intuitive play
- Charming music
- A lot of fun for every kids
